Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate alaha ne tuhade la'i tuhade gharam nu amana da sathana bana'i'a ate tuhade la'i janavaram di khala de ghara (kheme? Bana'e. Jinham nu tusim apane saphara daurana ate para'a daurana saukhe dhaga nala varatade ho ate unham di una, unham di ru ate unham de valam tom ghara da samana ate labhada'ika vasatu'am ika samem la'i bana'i'am)

Ate alaha ne tuhade la'i apani'am paida kiti'am ho'i'am cizam di cham bana'i ate tuhade la'i paharam vica lukana vasate (gufavam) bana'i'am ate tuhade la'i ajihe kapare bana'e jihare tuhanu garami tom baca'unde hana ate yudha vica rakhi'a karade hana. Isa tar'ham alaha tuhade la'i apane upakaram nu pura karada hai tam ki tusim hukama manana vale bade bano
Tam jekara uha muha morana tam tuhade upara sirafa sapasata rupa nala unham nu suneha pahuca'una di zimevari hai
Ate uha loka alaha di'am bakhasisam nu pachanade hana ate phira usa tom inakari ho jande hana ate zi'adatara loka unham vicom na sukare hana
Ate jisa dina asim hareka saparada vicom ika gavaha kharha karange. Phira inakari'am da maraga darasana nahim kita javega ate na hi unham di mu'afi kabula kiti javegi
Ate jadom zulami loka afata nu dekhanage tam iha afata na unham tom ghata kiti ja'egi ate na hi unham nu (bacana da) mauka dita javega

Ate jadom sarika bana'una vale loka apane (bana'e) sarikam nu dekhanage tam kahinage ki he sade palanahara! Iha hana sade sarika jinham nu asim tuhanu chada ke pukarade si. Tam uha iha gala unham upara suta denage ki tusim jhuthe ho
Ate usa dina uha alaha de sahamane jhuka janage ate jihara kujha uha ghari'a karade sana usa tom' dura ho janage
